channel.title: Homes on Pallavi Rajain
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pallavi Rajain

item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

Pallavi Rajain is a research scholar in Management Department at D.C.R.U.S.T. . Her research interests include women entrepreneurship, sensory marketing and green marketing. She has worked as project fellow for N.R.D.W.P project Evaluation Study of NRDWP at D.C.R.U.S.T.

She has worked as project fellow for MGNREGA project Preparing Perspective Plan for MGNREGA in Districts: Kaithal & Yamunanagar contracted to D.C.R.U.S.T.

item.title: teaching
item.description:
Teaching

I had been a teaching instructor for the following courses at D.C.R.U.S.T.M:

  • MBI111: Business Communication
  • MHA106: Human Resource Management
